#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;
int M=1000000007;

int n,sum,t,k,a;
long long f[105], bk[55][55];
void binomni_koeficijenti() {
	bk[0][0]=1;
	for (int i=1; i<52; i++) {
		bk[i][0] = 1;
		for (int j=1; j<=i; j++) {
			bk[i][j]=bk[i-1][j-1]+bk[i-1][j];
			if (bk[i][j]>=M) bk[i][j]-=M;
		}
	}
/*	for (int i=0; i<15; i++) {
    	for (int j=0; j<15; ++j) printf("%10lld",bk[i][j]);
    	printf("\n");
	}*/
}

int main(){
//    freopen("hex.in", "r", stdin);
//    freopen("dule.out", "w", stdout);
  binomni_koeficijenti();
  f[0]=1;
  for (int i=1; i<=52; i++) f[i]=f[i-1]*i%M;
  scanf("%d", &t);
  while(t--) {
   scanf("%d %d", &n, &k);
   cout<<bk[n][k]*f[k]%M<<endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
